Its not just a KopyKate bug.
All my files and zites are crash slowly in the system.
Optional files transmission default half finished, if you close the browser.Files and zites only load if the current time someone share the current file.If not later the ZeroNet system does not try to download these files.If you set up  help distribute all files the data limit high, the ZeroNet system contiune the download if you close the browser.

I know what causes the problem.
But this problem need fix to the ZeroNet developers.

 Problem1
1.If a user want download a zite or a large file see KopyKate or ZeroUp etc.The current time required minimum 1 active user who have the current file.If that is not the case the ZeroNet system does not download the file.Later too will not try to download the system.If nobody share the file the current time the file will not add the download list.

Problem 2

2.If you try download a large file (Optional file) from a zite and if have active user who have it. if you close the browser the download will not contiune.If you check the files you will see the files downloading are stopped.

The ZeroNet file transmission system is working wrong.The system expects all files when you try to download it.Its need a active user this time (NON STOP) who have it.

See a simple thing.If a zite in the current time nobody share the ZeroNet system are not try to download later.

If you set help distribute all files, set the data limit extremely high the optional files download are contiune if you close the browser.

The result: Large files goes fast unavailable.And you will see if you download it its half finished.Users get only part of the files so you get too part of them.Zites have the same problem.But the phenomenon is less noticeable.And there are slowly completly download the HTML files.Unlike in (Optional files) by browser request.But if the current time nobody share the zite (or files) the system does not try download later.See content json failed.

This two deficiency combination causes this big problems.I have signaled it to the developer because this is causing me too many problems.

This 2 problem are not a KopyKate bug its affects all zites in the system.And this is not a ZeroNet version issue.The problem is in the ZeroNet transmission  protocol.This is an old problem in the system.
